about_the_game:
Create. Remix. Share.

Step into Voxel Studio 🎨, the super easy way to draw in 3D using simple yet powerful VR tools! Create stunning voxel art with intuitive tools, share your masterpieces with the world 🌎, and remix creations from other artists! Whether you're a seasoned pro or just starting out, this is your playground for voxel creativity.

# Key Features:

🖌️ Easy-to-use VR voxel drawing tools

✨ Publish and share your creations

🔄 Remix and reimagine other artists' work

💾 Export your voxels for use in other projects

🚀 Future updates: More tools, community features, and shared experiences!

Become a VR Storyteller!

Using the versatile Remix Drawing Feature you can add linked iterations of any Artwork. Piece together multiple drawings to tell your Story! Invite your audience to join in.

All Published Drawings are instantly available for others to explore on the Explore Page. You can Like, Love or Dislike another drawing and also Remix it and make it your own.

Super Easy, Super Intuitive! We designed our drawing tools to be as logical as possible making drawing voxels a breeze. We're also actively listening to our community and taking feedback seriously. Join our discord to follow up on our development progress and leave any feedback our way.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4590/AMD FX 8350 equivalent or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA 1080 TI equivalent or better
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 350 MB available space
  • VR Support: OpenXR, requires motion controllers
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4590/AMD FX 8350 equivalent or better
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA 1080 TI equivalent or better
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 350 MB available space
  • VR Support: OpenXR, requires motion controllers
